The undersigned Comm ttee constituted under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International D welopment Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to sai I Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to Mongolia (the Recipient) a credi in an amount equivalent to SDR 12,700,000. The purpose of said credit is to improve integration and utilization of health information and e-health solutions for better health service delivery in ;elected pilot sites. 1. The Committee has care fully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit, and of the purpose to which the proc eds of the credit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of I le opinion that the project toward the financing of which tie proceeds of such credit is to be Epplied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agr, ement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Recipient ar d is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Recipient.
ï»¿Mongolia - 2 - (E-health Project) 3. Accordingly, the Commit ee finds that said project merits financial assistance from to Association, and hereby recommen Is said project for such assistance.
